The Evillious Chronicles:
Pride Arc Timeline

Once upon a time, reigning at the top
Of a fiendish kingdom was a noble girl of age 14.
—The Daughter of Evil

Events occuring during the Pride Arc.

This timeline is a work in progress and may be missing information from certain sources.

EC 457

  • January 14: Prim Rozgé is born.[1][2]
  • June 29: Anne Swee is born.[1][2]

EC 461

  • July 31: Zenon Octo is born.[1][2]

EC 462

  • January 15: Leonhart Avadonia is born.[1][2]

EC 468

  • July 1: Mariam Phutapié is born.[1][2]

EC 473

  • December 4: Mikina Sfarz is born.[1][2] Keel Freezis will also later claim this date as his birthday.[1][2]

EC 474

  • February 17: Kyle Marlon is born to Prim Marlon and the King of Marlon.[1][2]
  • April 1: Chartette Langley is born.[1][2]

EC 479

  • November 21: Clarith is born in Elphegort.[1][2]

EC 480

  • Elluka Clockworker joins forces with King Arth of Lucienia with the Sanosun Bridge Oath.[1][2][3][4][5][6]
  • August 25: Riliane Mouchet is born.[1][2]
  • November 5: Zita C. Beelzenia is born.[1][2]

EC 482

  • Zita is adopted by Leonhart Avadonia.[1]
  • November 1: Ney Phutapie is born.[1][2]

EC 484

  • Mikina meets Kyle at a Marlon royal banquet.[1]

EC 485

  • December 27: The twins Riliane and Alexiel Lucifen d'Autriche are born.[2][4][7]

Circa EC 490

  • Beelzenia loses all of its territory except for the southernmost territory of Evillious.[2][4][5][6]

EC 491

  • Arth Lucifen d'Autriche dies.[2][4][5][6][7]
  • As a result of Arth's death, a succession dispute breaks out over his two heirs, Riliane and Alexiel.[2]
  • December 4: Yukina Marlon is born.[1][2]

EC 492

  • Chartette Langley is kidnapped by bandits living in the Forest of Bewilderment.[1]

EC 493

  • Shaw Freezis is born.[1][2]

EC 495

  • Aile Freezis is born.[1][2]

EC 499

  • Anne Lucifen d'Autriche dies of Gula disease.[1][2][4][5][6][7]
  • Gumillia and Michaela are reincarnated by Elluka and Held into humans.[1][7]
  • Elluka Clockworker takes on the the forest spirit Gumillia as her apprentice.[3][4][6]

EC 500

  • Lucifenia invades Elphegort.[2][3][4][5][6][7]
  • A group of rebels revolt against the Lucifenian monarchy, resulting in Princess Riliane's capture and execution.[2][3][4][5][6]
  • Elluka obtains the Venom Sword from Keel Freezis.[3][4][5][6]

EC 501

  • Marlon annexes the Kingdom of Lucifenia.[1][2]

EC 505

  • The Retasan Coup occurs.[2][4][5][6][7]
  • The Hedgehog upheaval occurs.[2][7]
  • Michaela is reincarnated as the new Millennium Tree and planted in Held's Forest.[1]

EC 508

  • The New Four Horsemen incident.[1][2][7][8]

EC 510

  • Lucifenia becomes a republic.[2][4][7][8]

EC 531

  • The Freezis Foundation is established.[7]

EC 548

  • Elluka and Gumillia travel to Jakoku.[7]

EC 549

  • The Battle of Jagahara occurs.[7][8]

EC 558

  • Elluka and Gumillia depart Jakoku.[7]

EC 562

  • Rin passes away.[1]

References

  1. Epic of Evil: The Daughter of Evil Fanbook (悪ノ叙事詩「悪ノ娘」ファンブック), released August 26, 2012.
  2. The Daughter of Evil Schedule Book 2013 (悪ノ娘手帳2013), released December 16, 2012.
  3. Evils Kingdom (悪ノ王国), released December 22, 2010.
  4. Entr’acte of Evil: The Daughter of Evil Worldguide, released August 30, 2011.
  5. Deadly Sins of Evil: Evil Food Eater Conchita (悪ノ大罪　悪食娘コンチータ), released September 24, 2013.
  6. Waltz of Evil: The Deadly Sins of Evil Guidebook (悪ノ円舞曲『悪ノ大罪』ガイドブック), released December 24, 2013.
  7. The Muzzle of Nemesis (ネメシスの銃口), released August 17, 2014.
  8. Deadly Sins of Evil: The Tailor of Enbizaka (悪ノ大罪　円尾坂の仕立屋), released December 21, 2015.
